name: Tip-pity Top!
description:
DOUBLE Parkour your way through the treacherous mountain while boiling lava follows behind!

Swing through ropes, avoid spikes, and ladder parkour. WAIT! We forgot to tell you... there are TWO of you! Get TWO characters to the Tip-pity Top ALIVE! Double the trouble!

Play through the 8 levels OR play to get a better time!

This game was made for Brackey's 2021.1 Game Jam with the theme 'Better Together'. The idea came when I had over-scoped a game idea and decided to make a more arcade-style game. Here is the result! Enjoy!

Created by:

Breaking_Reality,

AnIdiotInATree

PS: Tip-pity Top! Does not own ANY music played, the music was created and is COMPLETELY owned by Nintendo Co. 

PPS: The font is FFForward
